title: Breaking the 120g Barrier: Pro Cycling Is Poised to Go Even Faster in a New Wave of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’
content:
Experts believe the fueling 'ceiling' is there to be shattered - the performance impact could be bonkers: '120 is a reference, but the exact number is far higher.'

Read the full article at Breaking the 120g Barrier: Pro Cycling Is Poised to Go Even Faster in a New Wave of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
